item.title: The Mac Miller Circles Fund Has Raised $700k Since His Death
item.description: Mac Miller's still making a difference -- his charity foundation's quickly approaching a million bucks in money raised to help kids in his hometown ... TMZ has learned. Folks at The Mac Miller Circles Fund tell us ... donations have been pouring in…
